title: Hello, World!
paragraphs: Welcome to my blog. This is the first post on my new personal site.
I built this site with a retro mainframe aesthetic â€” inspired by IBM z/OS ISPF panels and the Tron universe. The entire site runs on React and is deployed on GitHub Pages.
I plan to write about technology, acting, photography, and whatever else comes to mind. Stay tuned for more posts!
